name: My Friend Pedro Soundtrack
detailed_description:
The My Friend Pedro Soundtrack is a collection of 42 different tracks from 5 incredible artists, with a playtime of over two hours.
All Tracks Are Presented In MP3 and WAV Format.

Songs will be placed in your My Friend Pedro folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\My Friend Pedro\Soundtrack

Track list:

1. Navie D - Requium for Rose
2. Navie D - Junkyard King
3. Nounverber - V A P E
4. Navie D - Slinky
5. Navie D – Pulse
6. Noisecream – Discrete
7. Navie D – Scatterbrain
8. Navie D - Atomic Clock
9. Navie D – Squeeez
10. Navie D – Cave Crawl
11. Navie D – Sambafellas
12. Battlejuice – Low Life on The Highway
13. Navie D - Jingling Bells
14. Navie D – Sinkdrip
15. Navie D – Canary
16. Navie D – DSM-V
17. Navie D - Stop and Watch
18. Noisecream - The Alien
19. Navie D – Gifgang
20. Navie D – Automatic
21. Noisecream - Mist of Rage
22. Navie D - Welcome Home
23. Navie D – Popcorn
24. Navie D – Goosey
25. Navie D - Let's Lounge
26. Navie D – Ragequit
27. Navie D - Neural Scrub
28. Navie D – Doomgrab
29. Nounverber – Pendulum
30. Navie D – Turn
31. Navie D – Hunter
32. Navie D – Flutter
33. Navie D - Bad Job
34. Noisecream - The Doom Party
35. Navie D – Overshadowed
36. Navie D - Voltage Pressure
37. Navie D - Cold Stare
38. Navie D – Modumb
39. Navie D – StartSelect
40. Navie D – Basins
41. Maks SF - Look That Kills
42. Navie D – Together

short_description: Massage your eardrums with 42 different mind-bending tracks from the My Friend Pedro Soundtrack.The perfect soundtrack for any violent ballet.May contain traces of Banana.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Anything that runs MP3 or WAV files
  • Storage: 1600 MB available space
